h2_title: The Druken Boar and the Kindgom of Sahali
content: When he's sobered up, find him again at the Crouching Tiger Temple and bring him a Jade Lotus. After one more interaction with him, back at Rockrest Flat, you'll have to fight him to enter the secret Kingdom of Sahali.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Druken Boar and the Kindgom of Sahali'.
The content is as follows:
When he's sobered up, find him again at the Crouching Tiger Temple and bring him a Jade Lotus. After one more interaction with him, back at Rockrest Flat, you'll have to fight him to enter the secret Kingdom of Sahali.
